title: MoviePass subscribers in the U.S. 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of subscribers in thousands in the y axis.
The Number of subscribers in thousands is highest at Month June 2018 and lowest at Month December 2016.
The highest Month June 2018 has 2980.0 more Number of subscribers in thousands than the lowest Month December 2016.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of subscribers in thousands for 7 number of Months.
The maximum Number of subscribers in thousands 3000.0 is found at Month June 2018 and the minimum is found at December 2016 where Month is 20.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of subscribers in thousands in the y axis.
The Number of subscribers in thousands is highest at Month June 2018 and lowest at Month December 2016.
The highest Month June 2018 has 2980.0 more Number of subscribers in thousands than the lowest Month December 2016.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of subscribers in thousands in the y axis.
The maximum Number of subscribers in thousands 3000.0 is found at Month June 2018 and the minimum is found at December 2016 where Month is 20.0.
Month March 2018 has the second highest value for Number of subscribers in thousands.
The difference of Number of subscribers in thousands between the highest and lowest Month is 2980.0.
Number of subscribers in thousands at Month June 2018 is 3000.0 , second place is March 2018 at 2000.0, and thirdly is January 2018 at 1500.0.
The Number of subscribers in thousands has decreased over the past 7 Months.
The Month June 2018 tends to be 2.84 percent higher than average.
The Number of subscribers in thousands is 7395.0 if we add up values of all Months.
